snippet: EverydayHealth.com will announce on Thursday that Dr. Sanjay Gupta, the chief medical correspondent for CNN and a contributor to “60 Minutes,” will join the site.
abstract: EverydayHealth.com will announce on Thursday that Dr. Sanjay Gupta, the chief medical correspondent for CNN and a contributor to “60 Minutes,” will join the site.

headline.main: Sanjay Gupta to Join Health Web Site
